item.description: Join Lisa Law, Feng Shui Consultant, as she introduces the Ancient Art of Placement, Feng Shui, and answers some of the questions you have been itching to ask. What is Feng Shui? Why has it been used for centuries?Â  How can it be used to create abundance, stonger relationship and flowing health in your life? Come learn the secrets that mystify this ancient practice and find that Feng Shui is easy, fun and beneficial!

group.name: Abundance, Empowerment and the Law of Attraction
